items.title: Why Targeting Iran Is Riskier Than Ousting Maduro
items.description: Iran’s ability to strike Israel and destabilize the wider Middle East makes it a far more dangerous adversary.

items.title: The Secret Egyptian Air Base Powering Sudan’s Drone War
items.description: The covert base offers new evidence of how the Sudanese conflict is morphing into a theater for high-tech warfare, driven by foreign interests.
